subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Officials of the New York City Marathon started accepting lottery applications Monday for the Nov. 2 race on their Web site. Applications will be accepted until June 1 for those with a United States address and until May 1 for nonresidents and runners eligible for a guaranteed entry. The applications are being accepted online at ingnycmarathon.org. The entry fee for runners chosen in the lottery and those with guaranteed entries are $125 for New York Road Runners members, $155 for nonmembers and $210 for international entries.
